amendment.description: To express the sense of the Senate on the Transformational Medical Technology Initiative of the Department of Defense.

vote.text: Amendment SA 4537 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 4537 proposed by Senator Warner for Senator Cornyn. (consideration: CR S6377-6392; text: CR S6387-6388) To express the sense of the Senate on the Transformational Medical Technology Initiative of the Department of Defense.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 4537 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 4537 proposed by Senator Warner for Senator Cornyn.
